ai-tha-ap239:0.3_0: The Elder Nuns, having given a flower
ai-tha-ap239:1.1_0: “I used to have a small sea
ai-tha-ap239:1.2_0: “In the wilderness, I’m sitting in the wilderness,
ai-tha-ap239:2.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap239:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap239:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Piṅgiya.
ai-tha-ap239:5.1_0: Seeing the seventh Elder Nun Pippalavaṇṇā
